title: Milestones and Prizes
body: Does Riot offer any sort of Prizes for Achieving Milestones such as having 1000 normal wins for example grant the player on the 1000th win 975 RP or a forum tag or anything of any sort, iv heard things saying you can play with a riot employee in one of your games but im not sure that is entirely true, please do not hesitate to write down your thoughts on wither riot should give milestone prizes or if they already do please be so kind as to mention them below.

replies.body:
A Boards Badge for 1,000 normal wins seems like an interesting idea. I'm not sure how feasible it'd be to implement, but I'd still advise you to post your suggestion on the Boards Feedback sub-boards:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback

And yes, it's possible that a Rioter might play with you for your first win if you post it on the Boards, but of course, there's not necessarily an obligation to.

1. You can play with a rioter if you come onto boards and announce that you are close to your 1000th win.
2. Rewards shouldn't have to be given out for these, while they are "milestones" they don't really mean all that much, and honestly the game with the rioter is prize enough over what is essentially a cash prize.
